statements: UPDATE historical_images SET image_url = 'https://example.com/image1.jpg', tags = ARRAY['ancient', 'art'], description = 'Ancient Artwork' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE historical_images SET description = 'Detailed description of the historical image', tags = ARRAY['artifact', 'history'], image_url = 'https://example.com/image2.jpg' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE historical_images SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE historical_images SET image_url = 'new_image_url', tags = ARRAY['tag1', 'tag2', 'tag3'] WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE photographs SET photo_description = 'Updated description' WHERE photo_id = 1;
UPDATE tags SET tag_name = 'New Tag Name' WHERE tag_id = 3;
UPDATE photographs SET photo_name = 'New Name', photo_description = 'Updated Description' WHERE photo_id = 1;
UPDATE photographs SET tags = jsonb_set(tags, '{0}', 'Updated Tag') WHERE photo_id = 2;
UPDATE photos SET description = 'Beautiful sunset' WHERE photo_id = 100;
UPDATE photo_tag_map SET tag_id = 3, photo_id = 50 WHERE map_id = 10;
UPDATE photos SET photo_name='Family Portrait', description='A lovely family photo' WHERE photo_id=1;
UPDATE photo_tag_map SET tag_id=2, photo_id=1 WHERE map_id=3;
UPDATE HistoricalPhotographs SET description = 'Beautiful landscape photograph' WHERE id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
UPDATE ImageComments SET commenter_name = 'Alice' WHERE image_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';

UPDATE ImageComments SET comment = 'This photo brings back so many memories', commenter_name = 'Alice', comment_date = '2022-05-15 08:30:00' WHERE id = '78901234-e89b-12d3-a456-426614174000';
